Curate your city.

Empowering hotels to take control of the full guest experience.

Request Info
“The essence of hospitality is to enable richer travel experiences for guests.”

  • 50%

    of the average guests' time is spent off-property.

  • 63%

    of the average guests' budget is spent off-property.

  • 99%

    of hoteliers know their guests are impacted by their experiences outside of the hotel.

Give your guests the keys to the city.

Create a beautiful personalized city guide for your guests with reccomendations you know they'll love and remember.

Step 3: Learn their Preferences

  • 1

    View Analytics

    Allow unique access to concierge, fd, or managers who you want to be able to edit your page.

  • 2

    Adjust Activities

    See new requests and inquiries inbox received through the activity guide

  • 3

    See Upcoming Events

    Easily identify trends and usage metrics to see what activities and services your guests are interested in

  • 4

    Manage Users

    View and adjust the categories and activities on your micro-site or browse the CityKey content database to add new ones.

  • 5

    View Requests

    See where you’re most effectively reaching guests and where traffic is from—confirmation/pre-arrival emails, social media, mobile, wi-fi login.
